definition[0]: to try to find something that you cannot see by feeling with your hands
example[0]: Ginny groped for her glasses on the bedside table.
example[1]: We groped around in the darkness.
definition[1]: to go somewhere by feeling the way with your hands because you cannot see
example[2]: Ally groped steadily towards the door.
example[3]: I was groping my way blindly through the trees.
definition[2]: to move your hands over someone’s body to get sexual pleasure, especially when they do not want you to do this
definition[3]: touching someone’s body to get sexual pleasure, especially when they do not want you to do this
